masterclasses.title: Agentic AI using LangGraph
masterclasses.shortDescription: Master the power of LangGraph to build autonomous, collaborative AI agents.
masterclasses.longDescription: Join this focused masterclass to understand and build Agentic AI systems using LangGraph. Weâ€™ll cover agent orchestration, memory, decision-making flows, and LLMOps deployment best practices. Perfect for developers and AI enthusiasts eager to work with the latest GenAI orchestration tools.

instructor.name: Rahul Tiwari
instructor.title: Senior AI Engineer
instructor.bio: Rahul is an expert in building LLM-driven applications and agent-based orchestration platforms. He leads RByte.ai, where he trains professionals on cutting-edge AI and GenAI systems.

topics: What is Agentic AI and how it works
Live demo: Building your own multi-agent AI
LLMOps: Deploying large language model pipelines
prerequisites: Familiarity with LLMs and basic Python
benefits: Hands-on demo of building agentic systems
